column3: School of Social, Political and Global Studies
column5: This programme offers students and practitioners the chance to study in-depth, the evolution, practice, and theories of diplomacy in international settings. The knowledge and skills you will acquire will enable you to progress into a range of careers, be it in international settings or more
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
column9: 1 year full time, 2 years part time
